title: Login Issue?
body: Anyone else unable to curently loggin or created ranked 5's matches? Team mate and I, both getting Connection Failure.

replies.body: Yeah i can't seem to log in at all

Sometimes I get in, then it gives the "red indicator" saying disconnected... then instantly reconnected... then disconnected.. etc... Managed to get in a game last night and went smoothly, but at the menu, chaos.
Same.  Hangs on the 'logging in' dialogue before taking the whole client with it.
